Status Name: Media worker fired for migrant abuse
Status Message: The camerawoman is seen kicking and tripping up migrants fleeing the police, including a girl and a man carrying a child, in videos that went viral http://str.sg/ZXQY
Comment Message: I went to look for the video. It was totally senseless. The father, looked up with anguish, Why? The child was already scared and was hurt because of the tripping. At first it looked like they were caught by the police but in the end even the police let them off and they struggled as they ran to join the others who have fled. I also saw the other video of her kicking a little girl who was running away. She probably thought no one would see. but it was caught on video!
Reply Message: That's, in my humble opinion, an even worse reason than prejudice or hatred. I am not justifying prejudice and hatred. If it's just to get a photo that will sell, then she is truly, despicably low.
